articles.author: Ramishah Maruf
articles.title: Billionaire Gautam Adani indicted in New York on bribery charges - CNN
articles.description: Indian billionaire Gautam Adani and other executives were indicted in New York on Wednesday by US prosecutors for their alleged roles in a multi-billion-dollar fraud scheme involving plans to develop a major solar power plant.
